short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tells if you're going to win or not.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an unofficial couche-tard chrome extension that tells you if you are going to win or not in their games.

If the little rectangle displays "win", you'll win a prize during that round. Otherwise you are meant to loose.

The result can be seen by clicking on the icon or by pressing CTRL + B (windows) or CMD + B (mac)

Available states:
‚òÅ  - currently hidden
üëÅ - visible

Possible result with their meaning:
???     - you can't view the result because it is not a valid game.
WIN   - self explanatory.
LOSE - self explanatory.
